DataElement.preferredName: Gross Disease or Disorder Focus Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The status of the gross disease foci.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Findings About Events or Interventions Domain Gross Disease or Disorder Focus Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to findings about events or interventions._Visible to the naked eye._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection._A condition or state at a particular time.

Property.preferredName: Gross Disease or Disorder Focus Status
Property.preferredDefinition: Visible to the naked eye.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Arising from, pertaining to, or having a single location.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Arising from or pertaining to many locations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Status; a condition or state at a particular time.
